Teaching AI Literacy in the Classroom

Date & Time
Dec 21, 2025
2:00 PM - 4:00 PM
Location
Newark Teachers Center, Room 201
$0
Cost
100% Free
Intermediate-friendly educators

About this event

Practical strategies and ready-to-use lesson plans for introducing AI concepts to middle and high school students.

Calling all educators! This professional development workshop will equip you with practical strategies for integrating AI literacy into your curriculum. Whether you teach elementary, middle, or high school, you will learn age-appropriate ways to introduce AI concepts to your students.

We will explore ready-to-use lesson plans, discuss ethical considerations, and share best practices from educators who have successfully incorporated AI education into their classrooms. You will leave with concrete resources you can implement immediately.

What you'll learn

  • ✓
    Age-appropriate AI concepts for different grade levels
  • ✓
    Ready-to-use lesson plans and classroom activities
  • ✓
    How to address student questions about AI ethics
  • ✓
    Free tools and resources for teaching AI literacy
  • ✓
    Strategies for detecting and discussing AI-generated student work

Register now

✅ Free for all Newark residents
✅ No tech background needed
✅ All materials provided
